member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType
member.summary: Represents the contract type of a job opportunity.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Apprentice
member.summary: When you are learning and working at the same time.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Internship
member.summary: When you are doing a job as part of your studies.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.Effective
member.summary: When you are working with a contract and you are part of the company.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.ContractType.PartTime
member.summary: When you are working with a contract for just a specific period of time.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType
member.summary: Represents the location type of a job opportunity.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.Remote
member.summary: When you can work from anywhere and don't need to be in a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.Hybrid
member.summary: When you can work some days from anywhere and some days from a specific location.

member.name: F:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.Core.Enums.LocationType.OnSite
member.summary: When you need to be in a specific location to work every day.
